title: If you see this on Wal-Mart's receipt, should you call the police?
subtitle: Reports that shoppers fall prey to a 10-dollar "Vintum shipment" of Walmart that appears randomly on receipts a decade ago are incorrect.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Wal-Mart was adding a $10 Fentom fee to marketers' bills for 10 years.
